GK16dkavy1pu:1.4ab: idam andhaṃ tamaḥ kṛtsnaṃ jāyeta bhuvanatrayam /
GK16dkavy1pu:1.4cd: yadi śabdāhvayaṃ jyotir āsaṃsāraṃ na dīpyate // //
GK16dkavy1pu:1.5cd: teṣām asaṃnidhāne 'pi na svayaṃ paśya naśyati // //
GK16dkavy1pu:1.6ab: gaur gauḥ kāmadughā samyak prayuktā smaryate budhaiḥ /
GK16dkavy1pu:1.6cd: duṣprayuktā punar gotvaṃ prayoktuḥ saiva śaṃsati // //
GK16dkavy1pu:1.7ab: tad alpam api nopekṣyaṃ kāvye duṣṭaṃ kathaṃ cana /
GK16dkavy1pu:1.7cd: syād vapuḥ sundaram api śvitreṇaikena durbhagam // //
GK16dkavy1pu:1.10ab: taiḥ śarīraṃ ca kāvyānām alaṃkārāś ca darśitāḥ /
GK16dkavy1pu:1.11ab: padyaṃ gadyaṃ ca miśraṃ ca tat tridhaiva vyavasthitam /
GK16dkavy1pu:1.11cd: padyaṃ catuṣpadī tac ca vṛttaṃ jātir iti dvidhā // //
GK16dkavy1pu:1.12cd: sā vidyā naus vivikṣūṇāṃ gambhīraṃ kāvyasāgaram // //
GK16dkavy1pu:1.13ab: muktakaṃ kulakaṃ kośaḥ saṃghāta iti tādṛśaḥ /
GK16dkavy1pu:1.14cd: āśīr namaskriyā vastu- nirdeśo vāpi tanmukham // //
GK16dkavy1pu:1.20ab: nyūnam apy atra yaiḥkaiścid aṅgaiḥ kāvyaṃ na duṣyati /
GK16dkavy1pu:1.21ab: guṇataḥ prāg upanyasya nāyakaṃ tena vidviṣām /
GK16dkavy1pu:1.22cd: tajjayān nāyakotkarṣa- varṇanaṃ ca dhinoti naḥ // //
GK16dkavy1pu:1.23cd: iti tasya prabhedau dvau tayor ākhyāyikā kila // //
GK16dkavy1pu:1.25ab: api tv aniyamo dṛṣṭas tatrāpy anyair udīraṇāt /
GK16dkavy1pu:1.25cd: anyo vaktā svayaṃ veti kīdṛg vā bhedalakṣaṇam // //
GK16dkavy1pu:1.26ab: vaktraṃ cāparavaktraṃ ca socchvāsatvaṃ ca bhedakam /
GK16dkavy1pu:1.26cd: cihnam ākhyāyikāyāś cet prasaṅgena kathāsv api // //
GK16dkavy1pu:1.27cd: bhedaś ca dṛṣṭo lambādir ucchvāso vāstu kiṃ tataḥ // //
GK16dkavy1pu:1.30cd: mukham iṣṭārthasaṃsiddhyai kiṃ hi na syāt kṛtātmanām // //
GK16dkavy1pu:1.32ab: tad etad vāṅmayaṃ bhūyaḥ saṃskṛtaṃ prākṛtaṃ tathā /
GK16dkavy1pu:1.32cd: apabhraṃśaś ca miśraṃ cety āhur āryāś caturvidham // //
GK16dkavy1pu:1.33ab: saṃskṛtaṃ nāma daivī vāg anvākhyātā maharṣibhiḥ /
GK16dkavy1pu:1.35ab: śaurasenī ca gauḍī ca lāṭī cānyā ca tādṛśī /
GK16dkavy1pu:1.35cd: yāti prākṛtam ity evaṃ vyavahāreṣu saṃnidhim // //
GK16dkavy1pu:1.39cd: śravyam eveti saiṣāpi dvayī gatir udāhṛtā // //
GK16dkavy1pu:1.40ab: asty aneko girāṃ mārgaḥ sūkṣmabhedaḥ parasparam /
GK16dkavy1pu:1.42ab: iti vaidarbhamārgasya prāṇā daśa guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GK16dkavy1pu:1.51ab: madhuraṃ rasavad vāci vastuny api rasasthitiḥ /
GK16dkavy1pu:1.52ab: yayā kayācic chrutyā yat samānam anubhūyate /
GK16dkavy1pu:1.53ab: eṣa rājā yadā lakṣmīṃ prāptavān brahmaṇapriyaḥ /
GK16dkavy1pu:1.54ab: itīdaṃ nādṛtaṃ gauḍair anuprāsas tu tatpriyaḥ /
GK16dkavy1pu:1.54cd: anuprāsād api prāyo vaidarbhair idam iṣyate // //
GK16dkavy1pu:1.55ab: varṇāvṛttir anuprāsaḥ pādeṣu ca padeṣu ca /
GK16dkavy1pu:1.57ab: cāru candramasaṃ bhīru bimbaṃ paśyaitad ambare /
GK16dkavy1pu:1.58cd: na tu rāmāmukhāmbhoja- sadṛśaś candramā iti // //
GK16dkavy1pu:1.59ab: smaraḥ kharaḥ khalaḥ kāntaḥ kāyaḥ kopaś ca naḥ kṛśaḥ /
GK16dkavy1pu:1.59cd: cyuto māno 'dhiko rāgo moho jāto 'savo gatāḥ // //
GK16dkavy1pu:1.60ab: ity ādi bandhapāruṣyaṃ śaithilyaṃ ca nigacchati /
GK16dkavy1pu:1.61cd: tat tu naikāntamadhuram ataḥ paścād vidhāsyate // //
GK16dkavy1pu:1.62ab: kāmaṃ sarvo 'py alaṃkāro rasam arthe niṣañcati /
GK16dkavy1pu:1.63ab: kanye kāmayamānaṃ māṃ na tvaṃ kāmayase katham /
GK16dkavy1pu:1.66cd: duṣpratītikaraṃ grāmyaṃ yathā yā bhavataḥ priyā // //
GK16dkavy1pu:1.67ab: kharaṃ prahṛtya viśrāntaḥ puruṣo vīryavān iti /
GK16dkavy1pu:1.67cd: evam ādi na śaṃsanti mārgayor ubhayor api // //
GK16dkavy1pu:1.72ab: dīptam ity aparair bhūmnā kṛcchrodyam api badhyate /
GK16dkavy1pu:1.72cd: nyakṣeṇa kṣayitaḥ pakṣaḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ kṣaṇād iti // //
GK16dkavy1pu:1.75ab: nedṛśaṃ bahu manyate mārgayor ubhayor api /
GK16dkavy1pu:1.76ab: utkarṣavān guṇaḥ kaścid yasminn ukte pratīyate /
GK16dkavy1pu:1.77ab: arthināṃ kṛpaṇā dṛṣṭis tvanmukhe patitā sakṛt /
GK16dkavy1pu:1.77cd: tadavasthā punar deva nānyasya mukham īkṣate // //
GK16dkavy1pu:1.78ab: iti tyāgasya vākye 'sminn utkarṣaḥ sādhu lakṣyate /
GK16dkavy1pu:1.79ab: ślāghyair viśeṣaṇair yuktam udāraṃ kaiścid iṣyate /
GK16dkavy1pu:1.83ab: iti padye 'pi paurastyā badhnanty ojasvinīr giraḥ /
GK16dkavy1pu:1.83cd: anye tv anākulaṃ hṛdyam icchanty ojo girāṃ yathā // //
GK16dkavy1pu:1.84cd: kasya kāmāturaṃ ceto vāruṇī na kariṣyati // //
GK16dkavy1pu:1.85cd: tac ca vārttābhidhāneṣu varṇanāsv api dṛśyate // //
GK16dkavy1pu:1.86ab: gṛhāṇi nāma tāny eva taporāśir bhavādṛśaḥ /
GK16dkavy1pu:1.89cd: yo 'rthas tenāti tuṣyanti vidagdhā netare janāḥ // //
GK16dkavy1pu:1.92ab: idam atyuktir ity uktam etad gauḍopalālitam /
GK16dkavy1pu:1.92cd: prasthānaṃ prākpraṇītaṃ tu sāram anyasya vartmanaḥ // //
GK16dkavy1pu:1.93cd: samyag ādhīyate yatra sa samādhiḥ smṛto yathā // //
GK16dkavy1pu:1.97ab: iti hṛdyam ahṛdyaṃ tu niḥṣṭhīvati vadhūr iti /
GK16dkavy1pu:1.97cd: yugapan naikadharmāṇām adhyāsaś ca smṛto yathā // //
GK16dkavy1pu:1.100ab: tad etat kāvyasarvasvaṃ samādhir nāma yo guṇaḥ /
GK16dkavy1pu:1.101cd: tadbhedās tu na śakyante vaktuṃ pratikavi sthitāḥ // //
GK16dkavy1pu:1.102cd: tathāpi na tad ākhyātuṃ sarasvatyāpi śakyate // //
GK16dkavy1pu:1.103ab: naisargikī ca pratibhā śrutaṃ ca bahu nirmalam /
GK16dkavy1pu:1.104ab: na vidyate yady api pūrvavāsanā- guṇānubandhi pratibhānam adbhutam /
GK16dkavy1pu:1.104cd: śrutena yatnena ca vāg upāsitā dhruvaṃ karoty eva kamapy anugraham //
GK16dkavy1pu:1.105ab: tad astatandrair aniśaṃ sarasvatī śramād upāsyā khalu kīrtim īpsubhiḥ /
GK16dkavy1pu:1.105cd: kṛśe kavitve 'pi janāḥ kṛtaśramāḥ vidagdhagoṣṭhīṣu vihartum īśate // //
GK16dkavy1pu:224: // iti kāvyādarśe mārgavibhāgo nāma prathamaḥ paricchedaḥ //
